name: Dyson Sphere Corp.
description:
Fixed unplayable executables (could test windows only), for the two random downloads before the jam ended.

Tweak the settings before starting to play!

Dyson Sphere Corp. is a Solarpunk game inspired by other games in which you prepare and sell food. You'll have to manage your energy expenditure, grow food and sell them on the market. (was written at the start of the jam)

Made for Godot Game Jam #38, with Godot 3.3.4. 

Art, code and font were made by me. With a downloaded icon for the itch page link.

I used the sound manager from the discord with its feedback sound as well.

Music and SoundFX bought from a Humble Bundle sale a while back. From the following packs: 

  • Modern LoFi Ambient pack for music (Evolving City (loop)(96))
  • Interface and Item Sounds for sound FX (Futuristic Sounds (27), Special & Powerup (31) and Buzz Error (7))

Note: I know the setting is a bit of an impossibility and Dyson Spheres are really a 100% efficiency solar panel, but for the sake of Solarpunk and futuristic settings I'm taking these artistic liberties.

Source code on github: https://github.com/Touff-97/dysonSphereCorp.git
